parse_markers.error: No Page-level DocBlock was found in file src/Manager.php

docblock.description: Manager for multiple DI containers; the Manager is itself the main container, and it provides access to sub-containers.
Sub-container definitions.
Locks the main container and all sub-containers; once locked, they cannot be unlocked.
Creates and retains a new sub-container. The new container does not inherit configuration from the main container in any way; you will have to add params, setters, etc. on the new container.
Gets a sub-container by name, throwing an exception if it does not exist.
Gets a sub-container by name if it exists, or creates a new one under that name if it does not.
Gets the names of all sub-containers.

Returns a clone of a sub-container. The clone will have all the configuration and service definitions of the origin container, but it will not have any of the service objects. Calling get() will create new services that are independent and separate from the origin container services.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A clone of the named sub-container.

docblock.description: Returns a Lazy that, when invoked, will return a sub-container clone.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

parse_markers.error: No Page-level DocBlock was found in file src/Config.php

docblock.description: Retains and unifies class configurations.
Constructor params from external configuration in the form `$params[$class][$name] = $value`.
An array of retained ReflectionClass instances; this is as much for the Forge as it is for Config.
Setter definitions in the form of `$setter[$class][$method] = $value`.
Constructor params and setter definitions, unified across class defaults, inheritance hierarchies, and external configurations.
Constructor.
When cloning this object, reset the params and setter values (but leave the reflection values in place).
Resets the params and setter values.
Gets the $params property.
Gets the $setter property.
Returns a \ReflectionClass for a named class.
Fetches the unified constructor params and setter values for a class.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The class name to fetch values for.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array with two elements; 0 is the constructor values for the class, and 1 is the setter methods and values for the class.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

parse_markers.error: No Page-level DocBlock was found in file src/Container.php

docblock.description: Dependency injection container.
A Forge object to create classes through reflection.
A convenient reference to the Config::$params object, which itself is contained by the Forge object.
A convenient reference to the Config::$setter object, which itself is contained by the Forge object.
Retains named service definitions.
Retains the actual service objects.
Is the Container locked? (When locked, you cannot access configuration properties from outside the object, and cannot set services.)
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A forge for creating objects using keyword parameter configuration.

docblock.description: Magic get to provide access to the Config::$params and $setter objects.
When cloning this Container, *do not* make a copy of the service objects. Leave the configuration and definitions intact.
Lock the Container so that configuration cannot be accessed externally, and no new service definitions can be added.
Is the Container locked?
Gets the Forge object used for creating new instances.
Does a particular service definition exist?

tag.name: param
tag.description: The service key to look up.

docblock.description: Sets a service definition by name.
docblock.long-description: If you set a service as a closure, it is automatically treated as a Lazy.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The service object; if a Closure, is treated as a Lazy.

docblock.description: Gets a service object by key, lazy-loading it as needed.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: when the requested service does not exist.

docblock.description: Gets the list of instantiated services.
Gets the list of service definitions.
Returns a Lazy that gets a service. This allows you to replace the following idiom ...
docblock.long-description:
$di->params['ClassName']['param_name'] = new Lazy(function() use ($di)) { return $di->get('service'); }

... with the following:

 $di->params['ClassName']['param_name'] = $di->lazyGet('service');

tag.name: param
tag.description: The service name; it does not need to exist yet.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A lazy-load object that gets the named service.

docblock.description: Returns a new instance of the specified class, optionally with additional override parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of class of instantiate.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An instance of the requested class.

docblock.description: Returns a Lazy that creates a new instance. This allows you to replace the following idiom:
docblock.long-description:
$di->params['ClassName']['param_name'] = Lazy(function() use ($di)) { return $di->newInstance('OtherClass', array(...)); }

... with the following:

 $di->params['ClassName']['param_name'] = $di->lazyNew('OtherClass', array(...));

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of class of instantiate.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A lazy-load object that creates the new instance.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
